workflow.name: Monitor IoT sustainability compliance and ESG reports with OpenAI, Airtable, Slack and Gmail
workflow.description:
## How It Works

This workflow automates IoT device compliance monitoring and anomaly detection for industrial operations. Designed for facility managers, quality assurance teams, and regulatory compliance officers, it solves the challenge of continuously monitoring sensor networks while ensuring regulatory adherence and detecting operational issues in real-time.The system runs every 15 minutes, fetching IoT sensor data and structuring it for analysis. Dual AI agents evaluate compliance against regulatory standards and detect operational anomalies. Issues trigger immediate email and Slack alerts for rapid response. Daily data aggregates into comprehensive ESG reports with AI-generated insights, automatically emailed to stakeholders for transparency and audit trails.

## Setup Steps
1. Configure AirTable credentials and set 15-minute schedule interval
2. Add OpenAI API keys for compliance and anomaly detection agents, configure regulatory thresholds
3. Set Gmail/Slack credentials for alerts and ESG report distribution

## Prerequisites
IoT sensor platform API access, OpenAI API key, Gmail/Slack accounts

## Use Cases
Manufacturing quality control, environmental compliance monitoring

## Customization
Modify sensor polling frequency, adjust compliance rules, customize anomaly thresholds

## Benefits
Continuous compliance assurance, instant anomaly detection

workflow.name: IoT-Integrated Energy & Sustainability Tracker with ESG Reporting

parameters.text:
=Analyze the following IoT sensor data for sustainability compliance:

Energy Usage: {{ $json.energyUsage }} kWh
Water Usage: {{ $json.waterUsage }} liters
Waste Generated: {{ $json.wasteGenerated }} kg
Location: {{ $json.location }}
Timestamp: {{ $json.timestamp }}

Compliance Thresholds:
- Energy: {{ $('Workflow Configuration').first().json.complianceThresholdEnergy }} kWh
- Water: {{ $('Workflow Configuration').first().json.complianceThresholdWater }} liters
- Waste: {{ $('Workflow Configuration').first().json.complianceThresholdWaste }} kg

options.systemMessage:
You are a sustainability compliance monitoring AI assistant.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze the provided IoT sensor data against compliance thresholds
2. Determine if any metrics exceed regulatory limits
3. Identify specific compliance violations
4. Assess the severity of any violations (low, medium, high, critical)
5. Provide compliance status and recommendations

Return your analysis in the structured JSON format defined by the output parser.

You are an AI-powered anomaly detection and predictive analytics assistant for sustainability monitoring.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze current usage patterns for energy, water, and waste
2. Detect anomalies compared to expected baselines
3. Predict potential excessive usage trends
4. Identify equipment that may need maintenance
5. Calculate risk scores for each resource type
6. Recommend preventive actions

Return your analysis in the structured JSON format defined by the output parser.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
	"hasAnomaly": true,
	"anomalyType": "temperature spike",
	"riskScore": 85,
	"predictedIssues": ["equipment overheating", "potential failure"],
	"maintenanceRequired": true,
	"maintenanceRecommendations": ["inspect cooling system", "check sensor calibration"]
}

parameters.text:
=Generate a comprehensive ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) report based on the following aggregated sustainability data:

{{ JSON.stringify($json) }}

options.systemMessage:
You are an ESG reporting specialist AI assistant that creates comprehensive sustainability reports for investors and regulators.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze aggregated energy, water, and waste data
2. Calculate key ESG metrics and KPIs
3. Identify trends and patterns over the reporting period
4. Assess compliance with environmental regulations
5. Highlight achievements and areas for improvement
6. Provide data-driven recommendations for sustainability goals
7. Format the report professionally with sections for:
   - Executive Summary
   - Environmental Impact Metrics
   - Compliance Status
   - Trend Analysis
   - Risk Assessment
   - Recommendations
   - Regulatory Compliance Statement

Generate a detailed HTML-formatted ESG report suitable for investors and regulatory bodies.

parameters.content:
## Prerequisites
IoT sensor platform API access, OpenAI API key, Gmail/Slack accounts
## Use Cases
Manufacturing quality control, environmental compliance monitoring
## Customization
Modify sensor polling frequency, adjust compliance rules, customize anomaly thresholds
## Benefits
Continuous compliance assurance, instant anomaly detection

## Setup Steps
1. Configure AirTable credentials and set 15-minute schedule interval
2. Add OpenAI API keys for compliance and anomaly detection agents, configure regulatory thresholds
3. Set Gmail/Slack credentials for alerts and ESG report distribution

## How It Works
This workflow automates IoT device compliance monitoring and anomaly detection for industrial operations. Designed for facility managers, quality assurance teams, and regulatory compliance officers, it solves the challenge of continuously monitoring sensor networks while ensuring regulatory adherence and detecting operational issues in real-time.The system runs every 15 minutes, fetching IoT sensor data and structuring it for analysis. Dual AI agents evaluate compliance against regulatory standards and detect operational anomalies. Issues trigger immediate email and Slack alerts for rapid response. Daily data aggregates into comprehensive ESG reports with AI-generated insights, automatically emailed to stakeholders for transparency and audit trails.

## Intelligent Alert Routing & ESG Reporting

**What:** Issues trigger email and Slack alerts for immediate action. 

**Why:** Alert fatigue from undifferentiated notifications delays responses.

## Real-Time Compliance & Anomaly Detection

**What:** Fetches IoT sensor data every 15 minutes, parses and structures readings  

**Why:** Manual sensor monitoring misses critical violations and anomalies.

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
